body_html: Hmm, it's not just shape checking. The kernel also uses some persistent temporary storage, so it needs one kernel per Layer. The right solution may be to have it create a resource for that storage, then pass around a handle to it? A hacky solution would be to take a unique ID as an attribute to the kernel. We can chat tomorrow.
